resources.string: Select a theme file to import ℹ️
Supported formats are: hwt, hnt and zip ✅
Select a theme file first ℹ️
"You need to allow this app to gain access %s directory.\n- Tap GET STARTED\n- Tap Use this folder"

You need to create the folder named %s and allow this app to gain access to that folder.
- Tap "GET STARTED"
- Tap "Create new folder"
- Type folder name "%s"
- Tap "OK" and "Use this folder"

Now, you can change the font with these steps:
- Open "Themes" app
- Tap "Me"
- Tap "My downloads"
- Select "%s" and Apply
Now you can apply this theme in the Themes manager.
